## Security Checklist
> [!IMPORTANT]
> Please review the following before submitting.

- [ ] **Secrets Check**: I have verified that no secrets (API keys, passwords, tokens) are committed in this PR.
- [ ] **Access Control**: This change does not inadvertently loosen IAM policies or RLS rules.
- [ ] **Tests**: I have added tests for security-critical logic (if applicable).
- [ ] **Migrations**: If modifying the database, I have ensured RLS policies are updated.
